body_text:
I've gone with a bit of a combination of both options, seen in the latest commit: 514f335
On the route definitions, I use an ignoreSession variable to determine if it should handle changing the reported URL. Then, in order to know what the 'correct' URL is, I put together a getNamedRoute function which traverses the route tree and finds the specified path based on the given crumb. For example:
getNamedRoute('New Extension') === '/extension/new/'
getNamedRoute('View Recipe') === '/recipe/:recipeId/'
getNamedRoute('View Recipe', { recipeId: 3 }) === '/recipe/3/'

This getNamedRoute function will actually be useful in a few places, so I quite like this approach. I still have to write tests, but this code/commit is certainly open for feedback.
